page.title: 19Events:A Day in My Life
page.content: On a school day I usually get up at 0800 and get ready for school. Mrs. Barnes the infant teacher gives me a lift to school.The whistle goes at 0900.The teacher takes the register and we set down to some work.At 1000 we have assembly for 20 minutes then a 15 minute break.We come back in and do some more work for an hour and a quarter then have dinner and go out for our longest break,whistle goes at 1320.We might do some art and craft or some other activity until 1430 when we have another short break.Whistle will go and once a week we have do games until 1530.I usually watch T.V. all evening or sometimes I go and see my friend.I usually go to bed at 2100. Alison Baker { {* * * * * *
